header.title: PerfectPixel Web GUI
header.subtitle: Auto grid detection and pixel art refinement
header.description: Upload an image, adjust parameters, and get a pixel-perfect result.

upload_area.drag_drop: Drag & drop or click to upload
upload_area.supported_formats: Supports PNG, JPG, JPEG, BMP, GIF, TIFF

results.zoom_description: Adjust zoom level to view pixel details (1x‑16x)

parameters.sample_method_description: How to sample each grid cell: center picks the center pixel, median uses median color, majority uses clustering.
parameters.grid_size_description: Manually set grid size (width x height). Leave blank for auto-detection.
parameters.min_pixel_size_description: Minimum pixel size to consider valid (4‑20). Smaller values detect finer grids.
parameters.peak_width_description: Minimum peak width for peak detection (1‑20). Affects grid detection sensitivity.
parameters.refine_intensity_description: Intensity for grid line refinement (0‑0.5). Higher values allow more adjustment.
parameters.fix_square_description: Enforce output to be square when detected image is almost square.
parameters.debug_mode_description: Show debug visualization (grid lines over original image). Note: may increase processing time.

loading.processing: Processing image... This may take a few seconds.

about.paragraph1: PerfectPixel automatically detects the optimal grid size from pixel‑style images and delivers perfectly aligned, pixel‑perfect results.
about.paragraph2: Default parameters work well for most images. Adjust sliders if the auto‑detected grid seems off.
